title: [Reginald Relf]
creator_credit: Reginald Relf, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Reginald Relf tells of his time in the Royal Australian Air Force, training as a mechanic at RMIT in Melbourne. Later he was posted in Queensland, tracking aircraft flying to and from New Guinea. As well as sharing his experiences of this time, he tells of his joy and relief when war ended.
creator_credit_for_label: Reginald Relf, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
